title: Patch 5.15 Bugs Megathread

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! With every new patch Riot introduces to balance out champions and items there are some unforeseen issues that creep up and...

body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter today. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

You may also want to check out the reddit megathread that is linked in this thread. Our devs will also be checking that forum and providing updates there as well.

Thank you,
Riot Zaps


**UPDATE 12:20PM AEST: 
**
We've disabled the in-queue Ward Skin selection in Oceania due to an issue that could cause you to be unable to pick a champion. 

We've identified the cause of the problem and are currently working on getting a fix rolled out - [we'll keep you updated  when there's more information!](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)

replies.body: Game Client window closes post-game (not showing stats etc and allowing you to continue playing more games) you have to manually close the client in Task manager so you can open another instance and re-log back in.
bump as this is still happening for no reason, quit breaking your client, check your damn code.

seriously last 8 games in a row this has happened for today, and no sort of acknowledgement that this has been noted and is being worked on along with other bugs that have been posted and not acknowledged, so much for help and support section, what bs

Your "Support" is a fkn joke

Hello, yesterday, my game play was just fine. However, after this 5.15 patch there have been many bugs such as: incredibly long time to log in, delayed responses in gaming queue, and the worst is that even though I am playing at 45ms and 60 fps, whenever any summoner casts a spell i experience severe lag and dont know what happened until about 2 seconds later.

Me to my game started lagging with jumpy play during your bilgewater event, now it lags during EVERY match i play ranked, also i cant open my shop...17000 ip, i cant play anymore..can u do something? i heard patch 5.14 made a lot of players upset because of lag/disconnections which i also get from 5.14 bilgewater event.{{summoner:12}}

After my most recent match, it went to the 'Skip waiting for stats' post match screen. However the screen bugged and then a prompt appeared saying "Has encountered an errorâ€¦ yada yada" like the one after the ward skin bug. It wouldn't take me to the post match stats screen, and I had to skip waiting for stats. Error message left after I did that. Hasn't happened before, thought it might be from the latest patch.

EDIT:

Also experienced another issue, where I would rank up an ability, but the icon would not turn into colour, but stay black and white. Happened with a couple of champs, I think Fizz was one of them.
I can't login to my account because it says its the wrong password, even though it isn't. Help. I just wanna have a jam ses.
whenever i start i cant connect something about a application error how do i fix this please?

So... I decided to play a game of League. I updated and everything, played a game, and 3 minutes in I disconnect. I restarted my league and when patcher popped up it was updating all over again. Because I'm in the middle of a game and the update ended up taking 10-15 minutes long I'm bound to get low priority queue...
my items has this weird visual thing happening to it and my fps/ping is overlapped for some reason.

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue now, and a fix is being worked on - [more context around it here! ](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3fvf6o/patch_515_bug_megathread/cts9t8b)
Another patch, another 'unable to connect to pvp.net server' Sweet.
Changing a ward skin locks up the client and i am unable to click on anything including the minimize and close buttons.

Thanks a bunch for the report!

We're actually tracking this issue here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/sUEQWzGs-do-not-click-the-new-ward-skin?

If you're able to - please follow the instructions there and send in your logs to ocelivereports@riotgames.com
